pages.text: The Reclamation Table is an unusually cold receptacle which can sometimes be found in Vagrant hives, or crafted.

The Reclamation Table is used by Vagrants to convert excess parasite samples or equipment into Experience. It does nothing otherwise, or if a non-parasite attempts to use it. It can only send at most 16 stacks of items each usage.

The Table will absorb any items that are $(n)dropped$() on top of it when a Vagrant gives it biomass. Once the items are absorbed, the Vagrant will receive Experience in return. It appears that using the desired items on the table will have no effect.
A Reclamation Table some Beckon Membranes dropped on it. It is ready to collect the items.
